video.title: Ainori Love Wagon: Asian Journey
video.synopsis: Seven men and women board a pink bus in search of true love. On a journey through Asia with strangers, their goal is to return to Japan as a couple.

episodes.synopsis: The love bus rolls into Vietnam for the start of the trip, with female members Yumechin, Depparin and Asuka joining the guys in Ho Chi Minh City.
episodes.title: A New Journey Begins

episodes.synopsis: Yumechin and Taka hit it off at the beach, but their time at the night market doesn't go so well. Depparin starts to have feelings for someone.
episodes.title: Battle of the Sexes

episodes.synopsis: The group visits the home of a local family, prompting a discussion about happiness. Asuka seems troubled, while Taka gets advice from Depparin.
episodes.title: The Lotus Flower

episodes.synopsis: With the Love Wagon still rolling through Vietnam, Taka prepares a present for Yumechin. Then he decides to ask her a very important question.
episodes.title: Written on Petals

episodes.synopsis: ShyBoy joins the group as they tour Myanmar and learn about the culture of not getting angry. Depparin and Asuka both have their eyes on Yuchan.
episodes.title: The Smiling Country

episodes.synopsis: A stray remark from Hatomune devastates Yumechin's confidence, giving Asuka a chance. With stress building up, Depparin gets angry at the staff.
episodes.title: Say That to My Face!

episodes.synopsis: The day after the argument, Depparin talks with Hatomune, Yuchan and the staff. Everyone decides to make a fresh start on their journey together.
episodes.title: Robot

episodes.synopsis: The love wagon rolls into Mandalay to meet Dr. Yoshioka, who's dedicated his life to providing medical care to children, and to discuss "happiness."
episodes.title: Saving Lives

episodes.synopsis: Yumechin makes a confession to Hatomune, who has one night to decide his response. Then the love bus rolls into the next country: Taiwan.
episodes.title: Over the Rainbow

episodes.synopsis: Smitten at first sight, ShyBoy begins spending time with Kasuga. Depparin struggles with the clueless Yuchan, while Hatomune spends time with Asuka.
episodes.title: The Sky Lanterns

episodes.synopsis: Hatomune confesses, then waits for an answer from Asuka. The staff have a surprising announcement for the remaining members.
episodes.title: A Harsh Wind Blows

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed by the fallout from her decision, Asuka has a close call one night. Depparin struggles to choose between Yuchan and Akira.
episodes.title: The Moon Above

episodes.synopsis: Depparin waits for an answer after making her confession. On the way to Thailand, one of the members vows to make a fresh start.
episodes.title: Sparkling Tears

episodes.synopsis: The group meets their new member Tom, who has a very unusual relationship status. Yuchan takes extreme measures to look manly.
episodes.title: Time to Fight

episodes.synopsis: The group learns about gender expression in Thailand before visiting another orphanage. ShyBoy worries about Kasuga hitting it off with Tom.
episodes.title: The Fear in her Soul

episodes.synopsis: ShyBoy shows off for Kasuga in various ways, including singing and playing the guitar. His lyrics inspire Asuka to make a decision.
episodes.title: Mama

episodes.synopsis: After Asuka's confession, Yuchan decides to make a declaration of his own, and everyone waits for Asuka's reply. Then it's on to Malaysia!
episodes.title: True Confession

episodes.synopsis: The group gets to know new member, Shacho. They then talk to a family of Japanese expats about life in Malaysia. ShyBoy learns something disturbing.
episodes.title: You Lied

episodes.synopsis: Kanya has her eyes on Shacho, but Tom's life story intrigues her. Kasuga and ShyBoy wonder what to do about their relationship, but can't decide.
episodes.title: Broken

episodes.synopsis: Shacho takes Kanya on a nighttime boat ride, but fails to foil her interest in Tom. ShyBoy tries to make things right with Kasuga.
episodes.title: Love Wagon of Tears

episodes.synopsis: After talking over his worries with Shacho, ShyBoy finally tells Kasuga how he feels. The next day, he waits in the pouring rain for her answer.
episodes.title: Shy Boy

episodes.synopsis: The Love Wagon makes its final stop in Singapore, where Shacho decides to confess. After they return to Tokyo, one more surprise awaits.
episodes.title: The Shape of Love

episodes.synopsis: The members start their journey in India. Tom and Yuchan reboard the bus, while others are all new. And one infamous member rides again.
episodes.title: Incursion

episodes.synopsis: Depparin has a bit too much to drink and starts an argument with Tom, leaving him in tears. Then the male members try some pole exercises.
episodes.title: The Loudmouth and the Crybaby

episodes.synopsis: The members learn about India's rapidly growing economy, including its IT prowess. Isamuchan realizes Yuchan may be interested in someone else.
episodes.title: The Door to Despair

episodes.synopsis: Isamuchan is happy to spend an evening with Yuchan, but he soon realizes that drastic measures are required to make her notice his feelings for her.
episodes.title: Origami

episodes.synopsis: After Yuchan gives Isamuchan her answer, the love wagon heads to Nepal. One member steps up to handle the money and the group meets new member, Hidekun.
episodes.title: The Pure Arabian Sea

episodes.synopsis: The members go out to a restaurant for Hidekun's welcome party, but Depparin uses the opportunity to let Yuchan and the male members have it.
episodes.title: Love and Sorrow in Kathmandu

episodes.synopsis: In the morning, Yuchan reaches out to Depparin. Later, Depparin talks things over with Hidekun, but Tom is far too traumatized to forgive and forget.
episodes.title: Love at the End of the Century

episodes.synopsis: The members learn about the problem of child prostitution in Nepal before visiting the Ainori school. Yuchan frets about telling Myanmar her feelings.
episodes.title: The Redacted Diary

episodes.synopsis: After hearing of a legend foretelling good luck to those who catch a glimpse of the Himalayas, Yuchan climbs a mountain and makes up her mind.
episodes.title: In the Arms of the Himalayas

episodes.synopsis: The travelers head to their third country, Uzbekistan, where they meet their new members: artificial intelligence developer AI and actress Sakurako.
episodes.title: The Power of Music

episodes.synopsis: After a few days in Uzbekistan, some of the members' feelings start to change. The group heads out on a yurt camping trip, but not everyone's happy.
episodes.title: Take Me Camping

episodes.synopsis: The members put the camping disaster behind them and travel to the legendary city of Samarkand. They're invited to a wedding, and love is in the air.
episodes.title: Yesterday's Enemy, Today's Friend

episodes.synopsis: After Moa shares her painful secret, an emotional Dr. Morimori ponders his response. Then the love wagon rolls on to its next destination: Kazakhstan.
episodes.title: The Doctor's Tears

episodes.synopsis: In Astana, Hidekun and new member Mya start spending more time together. Depparin gets upset, but AI unexpectedly tries to cheer her up.
episodes.title: Absence Makes the Heart Grow Fonder

episodes.synopsis: The members meet a Japanese man from Karafuto who had been forcibly brought to Kazakhstan after WWII. AI begins to feel Depparin's absence.
episodes.title: Smile

episodes.synopsis: With Depparin's return, both Hidekun and AI find themselves thinking about her. Knowing Mya has feelings for him, AI decides to let her down easy.
episodes.title: AI in Love

episodes.synopsis: AI confesses his feelings to Depparin by reading her a love letter. The next day, she gives him her reply while Hidekun frets on the sidelines.
episodes.title: You're Even Pretty When You Cry

episodes.synopsis: The love wagon travels to Kyrgyzstan. Hidekun fails to make a move, while Tom develops a deeper crush on Sakurako after seeing her dance performance.
episodes.title: Shakespeare in Love

episodes.synopsis: The members have dinner at the home of their driver's friend and learn about bride kidnapping. Depparin's feelings, meanwhile, have begun to shift.
episodes.title: Shocking Twist

episodes.synopsis: Depparin gets a huge shock when Kasuga and ShyBoy arrive. He plays Depparin a song, and then they give Tom a pep talk about confessing his feelings.
episodes.title: Half and Half

episodes.synopsis: After his confession, Tom waits for Sakurako's reply. When the remaining members get ready to climb a mountain, Depparin vows to change for Junki.
episodes.title: The Promise

episodes.synopsis: On the mountain, Depparin must face her terror and find her courage. Once the members descend, she requests two tickets from the bus driver.
episodes.title: She Never Gave Up
